trans-unit.source:
As for the Taiwan calendar, years are calculated using the Gregorian calendar, while days and months are calculated using the lunisolar calendar.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array that consists of a single element having a value that is always the current era.

An integer that represents the era specified in the time parameter.
